bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description:
The default unit-test cases broken. (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/pull/1645>#1645</denchmark-link> is affected) Possibilities:
Update of SSAT may have uncovered hidden bugs related with tensorflow-lite test cases.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1646>#1646</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
Confirmed that this is related with SSAT updates. TODO: check if it's uncovered bugs of nnstreamer of it's bugs of SSAT.

Found the reason, It is uncovered bugs of nnstreamer. The new test cases from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/commit/f987fbc2c304ad5ee36ddf4c7cc4df1fc8e9d2c9>f987fbc</denchmark-link> are supposed to "FAIL" if "nnapi" is not enabled. However, in x86/x64 systems they should FAIL. Thus, we need to update /tests/nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow_lite/runTest.sh.
